column2: I am a fan of good BBQ and so far SMOQUE is the best I have had in Chicago! The brisket and pulled pork are mouth wateringly delicious... and their sides equally tasty. The Mac and Cheese is rich and creamy
column3: the baked beans are flavorful (from the meat they cook it with)
column4: and the fries are phenomenal. Portions are huge... but no worries... SMOQUE left overs taste just as good the day after!!!
